title: BRONZE PLAYERS WHO WANT TO TEAM UP. OR BRONZE DUO
body:
I'd just like to be in a dedicated team. I have almost every afternoon off. I love playing, and I want to kick some trash with a group of friends.

I main **ADC**
I can manage **Jg Top and Supp**
and I don't really play **MID**

I have a large variety of champions collected so I am flexible to changing for team composition.

replies.body: Any room left? Hit me up.

> [{quoted}](name=Simplicate,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QYliR4Z6,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-08-18T14:56:00.819+0000)
>
> Any room left? Hit me up.

Ya for sure, Ill invite you today as well at 6pm mountain time. Thanks for showing your interest.
Need a support?{{item:1332}} {{item:3069}} {{champion:16}} } run to me i'll heal you

> [{quoted}](name=Holy Demon Pally,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QYliR4Z6,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-08-18T05:34:15.386+0000)
>
> Need a support?{{item:1332}} {{item:3069}} {{champion:16}} } run to me i'll heal you

Your the only support I've seen come to the comments hahah, you are defiantly welcomed! Ill give you a roster invite at 6pm mountain time. Welcome to the team

> [{quoted}](name=Shadowplague95,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QYliR4Z6,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-08-18T14:10:46.439+0000)
>
> Your the only support I've seen come to the comments hahah, you are defiantly welcomed! Ill give you a roster invite at 6pm mountain time. Welcome to the team Defiantly welcome hmm? you want me to support Karthus?!? he's death defying

I wanted to leave a message to everyone who showed interest. We will be having our first meeting this afternoon 8/18/2015 at 6pm Mountain time. Well get the roster worked out, well organize our roles, and discuss the promotional.
can i join i main support.~^

> [{quoted}](name=Duckyx6,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QYliR4Z6,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-08-18T14:27:53.833+0000)
>
> can i join i main support.~^

Ya for sure, Ill send you an invite, thanks for your interest. Ill send you a roster invite at around 6pm mountain time.
Add me, im a jungler main. Let's start a team.

> [{quoted}](name=Dralegan,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QYliR4Z6,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-08-18T05:24:44.873+0000)
>
> Add me, im a jungler main. Let's start a team.

We can always use another member, thanks for your interest, Ill be sending you a roster invite at around 6pm mountain time.

Need top lane?
Bronze 4
Champ Pool = Jax, Darius, Renekton, Riven, Irelia
Can play anywhere.

> [{quoted}](name=IvI Siegfried,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QYliR4Z6,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-08-18T06:32:20.549+0000)
>
> Need top lane?
> Bronze 4
> Champ Pool = Jax, Darius, Renekton, Riven, Irelia
> Can play anywhere.

Ill shoot ya a invite to the roster at around 6pm mountain time, thanks a ton for your interest
i can play any roll main adc tho

> [{quoted}](name=NooOnee oo7,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QYliR4Z6,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-08-18T08:06:50.955+0000)
>
> i can play any roll main adc tho

Thats good, ill go ahead an invite you to the roster at around 6pm mountain time
Feel free to add me <3 Alcotte.

> [{quoted}](name=Alcotte,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QYliR4Z6,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-18T05:22:22.914+0000)
>
> Feel free to add me <3 Alcotte.

Ill go ahead and add you to the roster at around 6p mountain time. Thanks for your interest see ya later today
I'm down. I love playing top and mid, can manage support, but not great at ADC and straight trash at jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=GunGuy1911,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QYliR4Z6,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-08-18T09:46:56.197+0000)
>
> I'm down. I love playing top and mid, can manage support, but not great at ADC and straight trash at jungle.

Thanks we could use a great top, Ill be adding you to the roster at around 6pm mountain time.
I would be interested in joining a bronze ranked team. I main JG but I can manage most other roles and have a decent sized champion pool for most roles except ADC.

> [{quoted}](name=RandomLaner,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QYliR4Z6,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-08-18T11:28:06.824+0000)
>
> I would be interested in joining a bronze ranked team. I main JG but I can manage most other roles and have a decent sized champion pool for most roles except ADC.

Alright, thanks for your interest, ill be adding you to the roster later this afternooon around 6pm Mountain time
I am a very good Mid laner if you need one and can play very good in any other roles you need to be filled.
There you go man I sent you the invite :D
Ya man, Ill send you an invite to the team
Oh also, I have a nice mic and webcam
Duo partner or full team, which ever
